node.title: Confession and Repentance: The Conditions of Revival
node.description: In this week’s lesson, we will trace the importance of true repentance in the outpouring of the Holy Spirit as it is revealed in the book of Acts. We will also contrast true repentance with false repentance. Most of all, we will discover that repentance is a gift that the Holy Spirit gives in order to help us reflect Jesus’ love to those around us.
